ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:19:15 [Issue ID 4000-144299] urn:comicvine:4000-144299 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:44:41. [Issue ID 352964]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
A rewrite of the song "God Bless America" to accomodate the views of Rev. Wright.
Goofy interpretations of the difficulties of being energy and ecology careful.
Book covers mimicking some famous Dr. Seuss books.
A MAD look at working at home, where even the Pros are Con.
Shows how lame celebrity culture may become when even more people with no talent become famous.
New gags written for Dave Berg's drawings.
New ideas for political conventions.
A look at what may be taught at corporate training, to try to explain the bad customer service seen at stores.
Training tips for paparazzi.
The Black Spy sets a trap for the White Spy on a public sidewalk.
Coach Mike tries to whip the boys into shape but Monroe gets so frustrated that he overeats instead.
Character bios and continuity information for the Chronicles.
ComicInfo.Tags: Horton the Elephant,Lucy Pevensie,Alfred E. Neuman,Bill O'Reilly,Barack Obama,Aslan,Peter Pevensie,Lighter Side Doctor,Prince Caspian,White Spy,The Cat in the Hat,Monroe,Roger Kaputnik,Narnia,Susan Pevensie,Edmund Pevensie,Black Spy,Michelle Obama,The Grinch
ComicInfo.Title: The Fundalini Pages; G*d Damn America; A MAD Look At Going Green; Dr. Seuss for the Digital Age; The Pros and Cons of Working at Home!; Now That Anyone Can Become A Celebrity...; The Darker Side of The Lighter Side; Things We'd Like To See at This Year's Political Conventions; What's Being Taught At Other Corporate Colleges; John Caldwell's Guide to Proper Paparazzi Etiquette; Spy Vs. Spy; Monroe and...Teen Obesity; The Strip Club; MAD's Helpful Guide To The Chronicles Of Narnia Prince Caspian; Mad's Bewitching Prince Caspian Outtakes; Drawn-Out Dramas
